exam_name: MAH MCA CET - Maharashtra MCA Common Entrance Test
conducting_body: State Common Entrance Test Cell - Maharashtra State

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
MAH MCA CET 2024 - The State CET Cell, Maharashtra, released the final MAH MCET CET 2024 merit list on August 8, 2024. The final merit list for the MAH MCE CET link has been updated on the official website, cetcell.mahacet.org. The MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling choice-filling process for round 1 will be open from August 9 to 11. The authority will announce the MAH MCA CET 2024 seat allotment on August 14, 2024. The MAH MCA CET 2024 merit list was released on August 3, 2024.

The MAH MCA CET counselling 2024 registration process concluded on July 31, 2024. The authority updated the MAH CA CET counselling 2024 registration link on the official website, cetcell.mahacet.org. Only MAH MCA CET exam-qualified candidates can participate in the counselling of MAH MCA CET 2024. The MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration process commenced on July 6, 2024.

Candidates have to register and fill out the choice during the counselling process. The seat allotment will be done based on the seats available. Detailed information about the MAH MCA CET counselling schedule will be available on the official website.

The MHA MCA CET 2024 result has been declared on April 30, 2024. The authorities have updated the link to check the result of MAH MCA CET 2024 at cetcell.mahacet.org. Applicants can check the result of MAH MCA CET through their login credentials. The authority has released the MHA MCA CET answer key on the official website. Candidates can challenge the answer key of MAH MCA CET from April 1 to 3, 2024. The authorities have announced the MAH MCA CET 2024 result after considering all the objections. Qualified applicants will be called for the counselling process. The authority concluded the MAH MCA CET 2024 exam on March 14, 2024. The MAH MCA CET exam lasted for a total duration of 90 minutes and was conducted in two slots: slot 1 and slot 2.

The authority released the MAH MCA CET 2024 mock test on the official website. Candidates can attempt the MAH MCA CET mock test 2024 for free. The authority issued the MAH MCA CET 2024 admit card on February 27, 2024. Candidates can download the MAH MCA CET admit card 2024 using their Registration Number/Roll Number and Password/Date of Birth. The authority concluded the MAH MCA CET 2024 registration process on February 12, 2024. The exam dates for MAH MCA CET 2024 have been announced on the official website. The MAH MCA CET exam syllabus has been released by the State CET Cell on their official website.

MAH MCA CET 2024 application form filling process comprises registration, form filling, filling in personal details, course selection, payment of the MAH MCA CET registration 2024 fees, uploading documents, and final submission Candidates who wish to appear for MAH MCA CET 2024 have to complete the application process before the last date. Moreover, candidates need to check the MAH MCA 2024 eligibility criteria before filling out the application form. After the registration process, login id and password will be sent to their registered email IDs. The authority has announced the MAH MCA CET 2024 admit card, result, and answer key in online mode. The counselling process of MAH MCA CET 2024 comprises choice filling, seat allotment, payment of fees and document verification.

MAH MCA CET 2024 Latest News and Updates

  • MAH MCA CET 2024 final merit list has been released.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 merit list has been released.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 merit list dates announced.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration concluded.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration date has been extended.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration date has been extended.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration date has been extended. 
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration process commenced.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 exam result released.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 exam answer key released.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 exam has been concluded.
  • The authority has started the MAH MCA CET 2024 exam on March 14, 2024.
  • The authority released the MAH MCA CET 2024 on March 3, 2024.
  • The authority issued the MAH MCA CET 2024 on February 27, 2024.
  • MAH MCA CET 2024 registration date has been extended to February 12, 2024.
  • The authority has extended the last date for MAH MCA CET 2024 registration to February 6, 2024.
  • The authority commenced the MAH MCA CET 2024 registration process on January 11, 2024.
  • The authority will conduct the MAH MCA CET exam 2024 from March 14, 2024.
  • The authority has revised the MAH MCA CET exam dates on the official website.
  • The authorities have announced the MAH MCA CET exam dates on the official website. 

About MAH MCA CET

Maharashtra State Common Entrance Test Cell (CET CELL) conducts the MCA Common Entrance Test (MAH MCA CET). It is the entrance examination for admission into the MCA course in Maharashtra state. MAH MCA CET exam is conducted in online mode for 90 minutes in multiple sessions. According to the marking scheme for Maharashtra MCA CET 2024, a correct response shall be rewarded with +4 marks and an incorrect response shall result in a deduction of 1 mark. The MAH MCA CET question paper will be divided into four sections consisting of Mathematics and Statistics, Logical/ Abstract reasoning, English comprehension and verbal ability and Computer Concepts. Interested candidates have to fill out the form within the specified last date and qualify for the exam. The allotment of seats will be based on marks in MAH MCA CET through centralised online counselling.   

Applicants could fill out the MAH MCA CET application 2024 on the MAH MCA CET 2024 official website. After the conclusion of the MAH MCA CET 2024 application process, the exam authority concluded the application form correction facility. Applicants can advised to check the MAH MCA CET exam eligibility criteria before filling out the application form. The application process of MAH MCA CET 2024 comprised registration, filling application form, uploading documents, and payment of fees.  

To apply for MAH MCA CET, candidates must have passed a bachelor’s in any stream with a minimum of 50% (45% in case of candidates belonging to backward classes and PwD residing in Maharashtra only) mark overall. Applicants appearing for their final year exam of graduation or awaiting their final year results are also eligible to apply for MAH MCA CET 2024. 

Applicants who appeared for the exam are advised to refer to the MAH MCA CET 2024 syllabus for their preparations. Candidates must also go through the exam pattern and the previous year's question papers of MAH MCA CET to score well in the exam.

highlights.value: State Common Entrance Test Cell - Maharashtra State

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authorities of Maharashtra State CET Cell released the eligibility criteria of MAH MCA CET 2024. Candidates appearing for the MAH MCA CET entrance exam have to comply with the following conditions:

  • His/ Her Nationality should be Indian.
  • Should have passed bachelor's degree from a University recognized by University Grants Commission (UGC) or Association of Indian Universities with minimum aggregate marks of 50% for other categories (or 45% for categories of backward classes or persons with disabilities).
  • Should have studied Mathematics at 10+2 or graduation level.
  • Students appearing in the final year of qualifying examination are also eligible to appear for MAH MCA CET.

application_process.html_content:
The authorities concluded the MAH MCE CET application form 2024 online at cetcell.mahacet.org 2024. Candidates could fill out the MAH MCA CET 2024 application form on the official website. Candidates applying for MAH MCA CET can go through various steps as mentioned below:

1. Visit the official website at cetcell.mahacet.org.

2. Select 'MAH MCA CET' and click on 'New Registration' .

3. Enter the basic details like name, contact details and candidate email ID.

4. Fill the application form by carefully adding the requisite details.

5. Now upload the photograph and signature as per specifications.

6. Submit and proceed with payment of application fee in online mode. 

Application Fee

The table below shows the MAH MCA CET exam 2024 fees for the candidates who are filling the application form.

Category
Amount
General category candidates from and outside Maharashtra
J&K Migrant candidates
Rs 1000
Reserved category candidates of Maharashtra State only (SC,ST,VJ/DT-NT(A), NT(B), NT(C), NT(D), OBC, SBC, SEBC and Persons with disability)
Rs 800

Candidates may note that the application fee could be paid in online mode only through Internet Payment, Credit Card/ Debit Card (RuPay/Visa/MasterCard/Maestro), Internet Banking, IMPS, Cash Cards/ Mobile Wallets.

admit_card.html_content:
The Maharashtra State CET Cell has released the MAH MCA CET admit card 2024 in online mode. Candidates are informed  about the release of MAH MCA CET 2024 hall tickets via SMS or email. Applicants are required to login using registration number or roll number along with the password or candidate's date of birth, whatever is easily available.

Candidates are required to paste their recent photograph on the MAH MCA CET admit card, preferably one that was uploaded at the time of online registration for the entrance exam. The following details will be mentioned on the admit card:

  • Candidate's name 
  • Roll number
  • Name and address of the examination centre
  • Time of entrance exam

MAH MCA CET admit card download window

cutoffs.html_content:
The authorities will release separate cutoff marks for candidates belonging to the state of Maharashtra and outside, i.e. All India level. Admissions through MAH MCA CET 2024 is based on these cutoffs only. Those candidates who have a score above that in the MAH MCA CET cutoff will have to report at the stipulated centres for the admission process.

MAH MCA CET Cutoff

ParticularsMAH MCA CET Cutoff Links

All India SeatsMAH MCA CET 2023 Cutoff Round 1
Maharashtra and Minority SeatsMAH MCA CET 2023 Cutoff Round 1

MAH MCA CET 2023 Cutoff Round 2
Round 3
All India Seats
MAH MCA CET 2023 Cutoff Round 3
Maharashtra and Minority Seats
MAH MCA CET Cutoff 2023 Round 3

counselling_process.html_content:
The exam authority has released the MAH MCA CET 2024 merit list on August 3, 2024. The MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling registration concluded on July 31, 2024. The process of MAH MCA CET counselling includes online registration of the application along with documents uploading and verification of documents. Candidates first need to complete the MAH MCA CET 2024 choice filling with preferred choices of colleges and courses. After the option entry, the exam authority will release the MAH MCA CET seat allotment result on the official website. Shortlisted candidates based on allotment results will have to complete the document verification and admission fee payment. 

The following documents will be required 

  • MAH MCA CET Rank card 2024

  • Two copies of a recent passport-size photograph

  • Class 10th Admit card/ certificate or birth certificate (for verification of age)

  • Madhyamik or equivalent examination certificate

  • SC/ ST/ OBC-A/ OBC-B/ PwD certificate issued by competent authority (if applicable)

  • Domicile certificate

  • Higher Secondary (10+2) level or equivalent certificate

  • Degree mark sheets (10+2+3) as applicable

  • Any other documents are required for eligibility as per the criteria set by different Universities/ Institutes

To check the previous year's seat matrix for MAH MCA CET

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The authorities released the MAH MCA CET exam pattern 2024 to be referred by candidates preparing for the examination. It provides crucial details about the mode etc. in which the entrance exam will conduct on March 30, 2024. 

 Exam Pattern of MAH MCA CET

Particulars
Specifications
Mode of Exam
Online
Duration of Examination
90 minutes
Medium (Language)
English
Type of Questions
Multiple Choice Questions
Sections in Question Paper
  • Mathematics and Statistics
  • Logical/ Abstract Reasoning
  • English Comprehension and verbal ability
  • Computer Concepts
Maximum Marks
200
Marking Scheme
+4 for each correct response
-1 for each incorrect response

syllabus.main_exam_title: MAH MCA CET Maharashtra MCA Common Entrance Test 2024

units.topics_html: • Fundamental operations in algebra, expansion, factorization, quadratic equations, indices, logarithms, arithmetic, geometric, and harmonic progressions, binomial theorem, permutations and combinations

• Rectangular Cartesian coordinates, equations of a line, mid point, intersections etc, equations of a circle, distance formulae, pair of straight lines, parabola, ellipse, hyperbola, simple geometric transformations such as translation, rotation, scaling
• Differential equations of first order and their solutions, linear differential equations with constant coefficients, homogenous linear differential equations
• Simple identities, trigonometric equations, properties of triangles, solution of triangles, height and distance, inverse function

• Basic concepts of probability theory, averages, dependent and independent events, frequency distributions, and measures of dispersions, skewness, and kurtosis, random variable and distribution functions, mathematical expectations, binomial, Poisson
  • Normal distributions, curve fitting, and principle of least squares, correlation, and regression
• Ratios and proportions, problems on time-work, distance-speed, percentage, etc
• Set, relations, and mappings
• Areas, triangles and quadrilaterals, area and circumference of circles, volumes, and surface areas of simple solids such as cubes, spheres, cylinders, and cones
• Organization of a computer, central processing unit (CPU), structure of instructions in CPU, input/ output devices, computer memory, memory organization, back-up devices

• Representation of characters, integers, and fractions, binary and hexadecimal representations, binary arithmetic: Addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, signed arithmetic and two’s complement arithmetic, floating point representation of numbers
  • Binary arithmetic: Normalized floating point representation, Boolean algebra, truth tables, Venn diagrams
• Block structure of computers, communication between processor, and I/ O devices, interrupts
• Assembly language and high level language, computer programming in C

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at MAH MCA CET 2024 counselling
documents: Two copies of recent coloured passport size photograph
SC/ ST/ OBC-A/ OBC-B/ PwD certificate issued from a competent authority (if applicable)
Higher secondary (10+2) level or equivalent certificate
Qualifying examination mark sheets and degree

faqs.question: What is the last date of MAH MCA CET 2024 registration?
faqs.answer: The last date to fill the MAH MCA CET 2024 application form was February 12, 2024.

faqs.question: What is MAH MCA CET 2024 result date?
faqs.answer: MAH MCA CET result date 2024 was April 30, 2024.

faqs.question: Is the amount of MAH MCA CET application fee any less for OBC category?
faqs.answer: Yes, Maharashtra candidates belonging to OBC category have to pay only Rs 800 application fee for MAH MCA CET 2024.

faqs.question: Where can I find the syllabus for MAH MCA CET?
faqs.answer: The syllabus for Maharashtra MCA entrance is provided on the official website.

faqs.question: I pursued 10+2 without Mathematics but had Maths as a mandatory subject during graduation. Am I eligible for MAH MCA CET 2024?
faqs.answer: Yes, as per the eligibility criteria for MAH MCA CET, candidates should have Mathematics as a subject in 10+2 level or during graduation.

faqs.question: Is MAH MCA CET compulsory for MCA in Maharashtra?
faqs.answer: It is mandatory for MCA admissions in government institutes in the state of Maharashtra.

exam_name: CG Pre MCA - Chhattisgarh Pre MCA
conducting_body: Directorate of Technical Education - DTE Chhattisgarh

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
CG Pre MCA 2024 - CGPEB has published the result for CG Pre MCA 2024 on July 24, at vyapam.cgstate.gov.in. Also, the toppers list and CG Pre MCA final answer key have been released by the authority. Aspirants were able to challenge the model answer key for the CG Pre MCA exam from July 1 to 8, 2024. Applicants had to pay Rs 50 per challenge. The exam of CG Pre MCA was held on June 13, 2024. The authority issued the CG Pre MCA 2024 admit card on June 6 on the website,  Candidates could register for the Chhattisgarh Pre MCA exam from March 4 to April 7. The form correction facilities were available from April 8 to 10. Candidates can follow the CG Pre MCA 2024 syllabus to know the important topics for the exam. Moreover, knowing the CG Pre MCA exam pattern 2024 will help the candidates understand the structure of the question paper. 

CG Pre MCA 2024 Latest News and Updates

  • The authority released CG Pres MCA result 2024 , final answer key and common merit list. 

  • CG Pre MCA model answer key 2024 released.

  • The authority held the CG Pre MCA 2024 on June, 13 for 3 hours.

  • CG Pre MCA admit card out.

  • CG Pre MCA exam date revised.

  • The authority released the CG Pre MCA 2024 application form on the official website.

About CG Pre MCA 2024

CG Pre MCA 2024 is a state-level entrance examination in Chhattisgarh state. Chhattisgarh Professional Examinations Board (CGPEB), Raipur conducts Chhattisgarh Pre MCA for admissions into Master of Computer Applications.

Candidates who completed the CG Pre MCA 2024 registration were issued the admit cards. To download the admit card of CG Pre MCA 2024 candidates required their login details such as registration ID and password. The CG Pre MCA admit card is a mandatory document required to appear for the test and all further processes.

Students will get MCA admission in Chhattisgarh based on marks secured by candidates in CG Pre MCA 2024. Candidates who qualify for the CG Pre MCA 2024 will have to participate in the counselling process. Applicants will be offered admissions based on their performance and choices filled in during counselling.

highlights.value: Directorate of Technical Education - DTE Chhattisgarh

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
CGPEB has released the CG Pre MCA 2024 eligibility criteria online on the official website. Candidates can verify the CG Pre MCA eligibility 2024 here:

  • Candidates should not be more than 32 years of age for the unreserved category and the age bar is 35 years for SC/ST/OBC/Female/PwD categories
  • Students should have passed a 3-year degree course from any recognized university and branch/subject.
  • They should have secured at least 50% aggregate marks in the qualifying examination for unreserved categories and 45% marks for reserved categories.
  • The applicant should have passed class 12 with Mathematics as one of the subjects. (The authorities will not accept allied subjects such as Business Mathematics, Basic Mathematics. Higher subjects related to Mathematics such as Advanced Mathematics will be considered for Chhattisgarh Pre MCA 2024.
  • Candidates who have passed the BCA as a qualifying degree need not have Mathematics as a subject in class 12 as per the Chhattisgarh Pre MCA eligibility criteria 2024.

application_process.html_content:
CG PEB concluded the Chhattisgarh Pre MCA 2024 registration process. Candidates who fulfil the eligibility criteria could fill out the CG Pre MCA application form 2024. The application process comprises registration, form filling, uploading documents, and payment of fees. Moreover, candidates could edit the application form online. Students can check the process for successful submission of the CG Pre MCA application form below.

  • Uploading Images – Candidates have to visit the CG Vyapam official website at vyapam.cgstate.gov.in and click on the link to CG Pre MCA application form 2024. Students are required to first paste their photograph with the dimensions of 3.5 x 4.5 cm, and write their names and signatures on an A4 size sheet. They then have to scan the sheet and upload the file between 40 kb to 50 kb.
  • Basic Information - Applicants have to fill out the CG Pre MCA 2024 form by entering their eligibility, name, father’s name, date of birth, roll number of class 10, category and domicile details.
  • Other Details – After uploading basic information, candidates have to enter other details like religion, identification marks, J&K migrant (if any), contact information, address and exam city details, mobile and valid email ID etc. in the application form
  • Declaration Form – After providing the relevant details in the CG Pre MCA 2024 application form, candidates had to sign in and click on 'I Agree' along with the code. Candidates may preview the information and proceed further.
  • Application Fees – Candidates have to pay Chhattisgarh Pre MCA 2024 application fee online through Debit/Credit/Net banking by clicking on ICICI/HDFC/State Bank of India payment gateway. After successful payment, candidates were able to download the confirmation page of the application for future reference.

admit_card.html_content: The authorities issued the CG Pre MCA admit card 2024 to the registered candidates. Students can download the Chhattisgarh Pre MCA 2024 admit card online from the official website. Candidates must take a printout of their CG Pre MCA admit cards to the exam centres. They have to carry a photo identity proof and the printout of the Chhattisgarh Pre MCA application form along with their admit cards to the exam centre venue for verification.

counselling_process.html_content:
The exam authority will release the CG Pre MCA 2024 counselling dates on the official website. The authorities will announce the seat allotment result in online mode. Candidates will have to register for the CG Pre MCA 2024 counselling process before the last date. The CG Pre MCA 2024 counselling registration and choice filling will start after the result declaration. 

Chhattisgarh Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Raipur is responsible for conducting the CG Pre MCA counselling 2024. They will be conducting centralized counselling for CG Pre MCA 2024 for candidates based on their performance in the exam and names in the official merit list released before. No separate call letter/intimation letter will be sent to the respective shortlisted candidates. 

To participate in CG Pre MCA counselling, candidates will have to register online, deposit the participation fee, fill and lock choices, verify their documents for admission, seat allotment. If any candidate fails to produce any relevant document in due course of time than their allotment seats will be cancelled.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Candidates appearing for CG Pre MCA 2024 should be aware of the various details related to the examination. The exam pattern of Chhattisgarh Pre MCA prescribed by the Chhattisgarh Professional Examination Board, Raipur is given below for reference purposes:

  •    The exam duration of CG Pre MCA 2024 is 3 hours.
  •    The question paper will comprise 200 objective-type questions.   
  •    Candidates will be given 4 options out of which one is correct.        
  •    Each correct answer will be awarded one mark

Below is the subject-wise division of questions:                           

Subjects

Questions

Mathematics             

100

 Computer Awareness     

40

Analytical Ability & Logical             Reasoning

40 

General Awareness

20

Total

200

syllabus.main_exam_title: CG Pre MCA 2024 Chhattisgarh Pre MCA 2024

units.topics_html:
• Fundamental operations in algebra expansion, factorization, simultaneous linear quadratic equations, indices, logarithms, arithmetic, geometric, and harmonic progressions, binomial theorem, permutations, and combinations, surds
  • P determinats, matrices, and application to solution of simultaneous linear equations

• Rectangular cartesian coordinates equations of a line, mid point, intersection etc
  • Equations of a circle, distance formula, pair of straight lines, parabola, ellipse and hyperbola, simple geometric transformations such as translation, rotation, scaling

• Limit of functions, continuous fuctions, differentiation of functions (s), tangents and normal, simple example of maxima and minima, integration of function by parts by substitution and by partial fraction
  • Definite integral application to volumes and surfaces of frustums of sphere, cone cylinder, Taylor series
• Differential equations of first order and their solutions, linear differential equations with constant coefficients, homogenous linear differential equations
• Position vector and subtraction of vectors, scalar and vector products, and their applications to simple geometrical problems and mechanics
• Simple identities, trigonometric equations, properties of triangles, solution of triangles, height and distance, inverse fuctions

• Basic concepts of probability theory
  • Averages dependent and independent events, frequency distributions, and measures of dispersions, binomial poisson, normal distributions, curve fitting, and principle of least squares, correlation, and regressions
• Formulations of simple linear programming problems, basic concepts of graphical, and simplex methods
• Organization of computer, central processing unit (CPU), structure of instructions in CPU, input output devices computer memory, memory organization, back-up devices

• Representation of characters, integers, and fraction
  • Binary and hexadecimal representations, binary airthmetic: Floating point representation of numbers, normalized floating point representation, Boolean algebra, truth tables, Venn diagrams
• Block structure of computers, communication between processor, and input/output devices interrupts

• Assembly language and high level language, multiprogramming, and time sharing operating systems
  • Computer programming in C

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at CG Pre MCA 2024 counselling
documents: Permanent caste certificate only for reserve category candidates of Chhattisgarh

faqs.question: Where does the CG Pre MCA 2024 exam take place?
faqs.answer: The CG Pre MCA exam 2024 takes place in Raipur city only.

faqs.question: What is the application form correction facility date of CG Pre MCA 2024?
faqs.answer: The application form correction facility date for CG Pre MCA 2024 was from April 8 to 10, 2024.

faqs.question: When will the application form of CG Pre MCA 2024 release?
faqs.answer: The application form of CG Pre MCA 2024 was released on March 4, 2024.

faqs.question: What is CG Pre MCA result date 2024?
faqs.answer: The authorities have announced the CG Pre MCA 2024 result date online. The result link has been activated on July 24, 2024.

faqs.question: Will the authorities release the model answer key Chhattisgarh Pre MCA?
faqs.answer: Yes, the CG Pre MCA model answer key was released on the official website.

faqs.question: How many sections will be there for CG Pre MCA 2024?
faqs.answer: There will be 4 sections in the CG Pre MCA question paper - Mathematics, Computer Awareness, Analytical Ability & Logical Reasoning and General Awareness.

faqs.question: Can I apply for CG Pre MCA 2024 exam through offline mode?
faqs.answer: No, the authorities released the CG Pre MCA application form online mode only and applicants had to complete the CG Pre MCA registration online.

exam_name: NIMCET - National Institute of Technology Master of Computer Applications Common Entrance Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
NIMCET 2024 - NIT Jamshedpur announced the NIMCET 2024 seat allotment for special round on July 29. The link to check the seat allotment for NIMCET 2024 is updated on the website, nimcet.admissions.nic.in. The authority concluded the NIMCET counselling 2024 registration and choice-filling process for the special round on July 28, 2024. The authority updated the NIMCET 2024 counselling registration link on the official website.

The link to check the seat allotment of NIMCET 2024 special round counselling will be updated on the website, nimcet.admissions.nic.in. The authority commenced the NIMCET 2024 choice filling and registration for the special round on July 23. NIMCET 2024 seat allotment for round 3 was released on July 18. The link to check the seat allotment of NIMCET 2024 is updated on the official website. Candidates allotted seats in round 3 have to report online and pay the partial fee from July 19 to 22. The authority declared the NIMCET 2024 round 2 seat allotment on July 13, 2024. Moreover, the NIMCET 2024 seat allotment result for round 1 was declared on July 8, 2024. The authority conducted the NIMCET 2024 counselling registration and choice-filling portal from June 29 to July 6. 

NIT Jamshedpur announced the result of NIMCET 2024 on June 26. The NIMCET 2024 exam was held on June 8. Candidates had to carry the NIMCET admit card 2024 on the exam day. Moreover, candidates had to follow the exam day guidelines. Applicants must follow the NIMCET 2024 syllabus and exam pattern to prepare for the entrance test. NIMCET 2024 question paper consists of 120 questions divided into four sections - Mathematics, Analytical Ability & Logical Reasoning, Computer Awareness and General English. Candidates were awarded 4 marks for each correct response, while 1 mark will be deducted for each incorrect response.

Candidates could edit the NIMCET 2024 application form from April 26 to 28. Students aspiring for MTech admission at NIMCET participating institutes must fill out and apply before the last date to be eligible to appear for the exam. The authority concluded the NIMCET 2024 registration process on April 24, 2024. Registered candidates can access the application form for NIMCET 2024 from the website, nimcet.in. According to the NIMCET eligibility criteria, applicants must be Indian nationals who have graduated in Science/IT/CA/Technology or Engineering, with at least 60% marks or a 6.5 CGPA. It is advised that candidates carefully review the NIMCET 2024 eligibility criteria before applying for the entrance exam.

NIMCET Latest News and Notifications

  • NIMCET seat allotment for special round released.
  • The choice filling and registration for the NIMCET special round extended.
  • The choice filling and registration for the NIMCET special round commenced.
  • NIMCET 2024 seat allotment for round 2 was declared on July 13, 2024.
  • NIMCET 2024 seat allotment for round 1 was declared on July 8, 2024.
  • Registration and choice filling for counselling of NIMCET 2024 closed on July 6, 2024.
  • NIMCET 2024 counselling registration commenced.

About NIMCET

The authorities conduct the National Institute of Technology Master of Computer Applications Common Entrance Test (NIMCET) as a computer-based test. NIMCET exam is conducted every year by one of the National Institutes of Technology (NITs) for MCA admissions at NITs itself, however, various other institutes accept NIMCET scores.

NIMCET Participating Institutes

  • National Institute of Technology, Agartala

  • National Institute of Technology, Allahabad

  • National Institute of Technology, Bhopal

  • National Institute of Technology, Calicut

  • National Institute of Technology, Jamshedpur

  • National Institute of Technology, Kurukshetra

  • National Institute of Technology, Raipur

  • National Institute of Technology, Surathkal

  • National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirappalli

  • National Institute of Technology, Warangal

highlights.value: National Institute of Technology Master of Computer Applications Common Entrance Test

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authorities has released the NIMCET eligibility criteria 2024 along with the official notification. The NIMCET 2024 eligibility criteria includes the basic requirements like nationality, academic qualifications, age limit and other parameters. Only those candidates complying with the eligibility criteria of NIMCET 2024 will be eligible for MCA admissions. The NIMCET eligibility criteria has been explained below: 

NIMCET Eligibility Criteria 2024

Particulars

Requirements

Nationality

Candidates applying for NIMCET 2024 should be Indian nationals

Academic qualification

Candidates should have passed B.Sc. / B.Sc. (Hons) / BCA / BIT of minimum three years with Maths or Statistics
OR
 They should have a 4 year degree in B.E./ B.Tech

Students who have studied B.Sc./ B.Sc. (Hons)/BCA/ BIT of 3 years from recognized Open Universities are also eligible

Pass Percentage

Candidates of Gen/OBC categories should have secured an aggregate of 60% marks or 6.5 CGPA on a 10-point scales 

SC/ST Candidates should have obtained 55% marks or 6.0 CGPA on a 10-point scale 

Passing Year

Candidates should have completed their qualifying degree before 2024. Final year students can also apply and must furnish proof of passing by the date specified

Note: Final year students have to furnish a certificate issued by Head of the institution where the candidate has studied.

application_process.html_content:
NIT Jamshedpur concluded the NIMCET application form correction process on April 28. THe form correction link was active on the official website. The authority concluded the NIMCET 2024 registration process on April 24, 2024. Candidates should complete the NIMCET 2024 registration and application process before the deadline. Below are the steps for filling out the NIMCET application 2024:

  1. Registration: Candidates have to visit the official website at nimcet.in and click on the link to apply for NIMCET 2024. They have to enter their e-mail ID along with the 10-digit mobile number. An mail was sent to the candidates for validation and creating a unique password. 
  2. Application Form: After successful registration and login, candidates had to proceed with the NIMCET 2024 application form. They have to fill in the personal and academic details. They also have to opt for three cities for exam centres in the order of preference.
  3. Uploading documents: Candidates will next have to upload their photograph and scanned copy of their signature in the NIMCET application form. Relevant documents such as proof of identity, date of birth (SSLC/ 10th Marks Card), all other marks cards etc. and the category/ caste/ PwD certificate(s) have to be uploaded. Such documents have to be self-attested and scanned as per specifications. 
  4. Application fees: After providing all the necessary information, candidates have to pay the NIMCET application fee online only through net banking or credit/debit cards.
  5. Submission of the application:  After paying of the NIMCET 2024 application fee, candidates have to finally submit the application form. They have to download and save the soft copy of the application submitted for their reference.

admit_card.html_content:
The authority issued the NIMCET admit card 2024 in online mode. The NIMCET 2024 admit card release date is May 28. The NIMCET 2024 admit card is an important document to be carried to the exam hall for verification purposes.

How to download the NIMCET admit card?

  • Visit the NIMCET official website at nimcet.in
  • Candidates have to log in using their email ID and password.
  • The NIMCET 2024 admit card shall appear on the screen
  • Candidates must check the details and download it.
  • Candidates need to take a printout at the exam hall

Details mentioned in the admit card

Candidates will find the following information in the NIMCET admit card 2024:

  • Candidate's name
  • NIMCET 2024 Registration Number
  • Category
  • Gender
  • Candidate's photograph
  • Signature of the candidate
  • Date and time of exam
  • Address of test centre
  • Instructions for the exam 

In case of discrepancy in details, candidates must contact the authorities to get them corrected.

counselling_process.html_content:
The authority released the NIMCET seat allotment for the special round on July 29. Candidates can check the seat allotment for NIMCET 2024 on the website, nimcet.admissions.nic.in. NIMCET 2024 counselling registration and choice filling concluded on July 28, 2024. Candidates had to complete the NIMCET counselling registration and choice filling online. It included the filling out of choice of courses and colleges to be considered for allotment of seats. NIMCET 2024 seat allotment for a special round has been released.

NIMCET 2024 Counselling Process

Candidates can follow the detailed steps below for reference purposes only.

  • Choice Filling: Candidates must log in using email and password, fill in choices of course and institute as per the order of preference, lock the choice of course and colleges and then submit.
  • Allotment: The authorities shall allot the seats in three rounds based on rank obtained by candidates in NIMCET 2024, choice of course and institute opted for.
  • Reporting and Payment of Admission Fee: Candidates allotted a seat during NIMCET counselling must download the allotment letter and pay a partial admission fee of Rs 10,000 online. They also have to report to the nearest NIMCET 2024 reporting centre carrying the payment receipt and the documents in original for verification. After that, candidates will have the following options:

Option 1: They may choose to keep the seat allotted to them. In such a case all their higher preference choices will be disregarded.

Option 2: Those who wish to be considered for all of their higher preference choices in the next round.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The authorities has released the NIMCET 2024 exam pattern at the official website. The NIMCET 2024 will be conducted online as a computer based test. NIMCET exam pattern 2024 aids the candidates for preparation and also equips them with a better understanding of the question paper. 

NIMCET 2024 Exam Pattern

ParticularsDetails

Language of Exam

English

Duration of Exam

2 hours

Mode of Exam

Online

Marking Scheme

4 marks for a correct answer and -1 mark for a wrong answer

Subjects

Total Questions

Total Marks

50

200

40

160

Computer Awareness

10

40

20

80

Total

120

480

syllabus.main_exam_title: NIMCET National Institute of Technology Master of Computer Applications Common Entrance Test 2024

units.topics_html:
• Concept of sets-union, intersection, cardinality, elementary counting
  • Permutations and combinations
• Basic concepts of probability theory, averages, dependent and independent events, frequency distributions, measures of central tendencies and dispersions

• Fundamental operations in algebra, expansions, factorization, simultaneous linear/quadratic equations, indices, logarithms, arithmetic, geometric and harmonic progressions, determinants and matrices
• Rectangular Cartesian coordinates, distance formulae, equation of a line, and intersection of lines, pair of straight lines, equations of a circle, parabola, ellipse and hyperbola

• Limit of functions, continuous function, differentiation of function, tangents and normals, simple examples of maxima and minima
  • Integration of functions by parts, by substitution and by partial fraction, definite integrals, applications of definite integrals to areas
• Position vector, addition and subtraction of vectors, scalar and vector products and their applications to simple geometrical problems and mechanics
• Simple identities, trigonometric equations, properties of triangles, solution of triangles, heights and distances, general solutions of trigonometric equations

units.syllabus_heading: Logical situation and facts in the given passage

units.topics_html: • Organization of a computer, central processing unit (CPU), structure of instructions in CPU, input/output devices, computer memory, and back-up devices

• Representation of characters, integers and fractions, binary and hexadecimal representations
  • Binary arithmetic: Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, simple arithmetic and two's complement arithmetic, floating point representation of numbers
• Usage of correct forms of verbs, prepositions and articles

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at NIMCET 2024 counselling
documents: Category/ caste/ PwD certificate(s), whichever is applicable

faqs.answer: NIMCET 2024 was conducted as a computer-based test.

exam_name: Assam JMEE - Assam Joint MCA Entrance Examination

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Assam JMEE 2024 - DTE Assam has uploaded the JMEE seat allotment 2024 for round 2 at jljm.dtecounselling.in. All the details regarding the date and time of reporting to the allotted colleges are given in the JMEE seat allotment letter. Candidates need to use their JMEE 2024 roll number and date of birth as login credentials to download the allotment order. The authority released the round 1 Assam JMEE seat allotment on August 29, 2024. The authority concluded the choice filling for JMEE 2024 counselling on August 22, 2024. Candidates who have qualified the JMEE exam can participate in the Assam JMEE counselling process. The authority conducted the Assam JMEE counselling in two rounds.

The authority announced the Assam JMEE result 2024 on August 5, 2024. The Assam CEE 2024 provisional answer key has been released on July 23, 2024. Assam JMEE 2024 was conducted on July 21. The exam was held for three hours. Candidates had to carry the Assam JMEE admit card to the test centre. The authority issued the Assam JMEE 2024 admit card on July 12. 

The link to download the admit card of Assam JMEE 2024 updated on the website, astu.ac.in. The authority concluded the Assam JMEE 2024 registration on July 8. Candidates could register for Assam JMEE online at the official website. Candidates had to check eligibility criteria before applying for Assam JMEE 2024. Note that the Assam MCA admission will be conducted only through Assam JMEE 2024. The Assam JMEE 2024 application form was released on June 21, 2024. ASTU conducts the Joint MCA Entrance Exam (JMEE) for admission to Masters in Computer Applications.

Candidates are advised to know the Assam JMEE exam pattern beforehand. The question paper of JMEE 2024 was in English medium and candidates had to mark their answers on an OMR sheet. The multiple-choice questions were distributed into four sections, i.e. Mathematics, Reasoning, English and Fundamentals of Computing. Lastly, negative marking is done, wherein candidates are awarded 4 marks for each correct answer and 1 mark is deducted for an incorrect response.

The eligibility criteria of Assam JMEE 2024 consist of minimum educational qualification, age, minimum marks secured in the entrance examination, and more. Candidates should check the Assam JMEE 2024 eligibility criteria to ensure they are not disqualified at any point in the admission procedure.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
The authorities has released the Assam JMEE 2024 eligibility criteria at the official website. The eligibility criteria includes the conditions and requirements that candidates are required to meet to apply for JMEE 2024. 

JMEE Eligibility Criteria 2024

Age

Between 20-26 years

Academic qualification

Graduate with mathematics (passed) in 10+2 or graduate level

Minimum marks required

50% marks (45% for the reserved category)

application_process.html_content:
The authority has concluded the Assam JMEE registration process. Interested candidates had to apply for Assam JMEE 2024 before the last date. Note that the candidates are not required to send a hard copy of the complete JMEE 2024 application form to the exam conducting office. 

How to fill Assam JMEE 2024 Application Form?

  • Visit the official website and click on the 'JMEE application form 2024' link.

  • Register with your valid e-mail address and mobile number.

  • Candidates will receive their unique application number via text message. 

  • Type in your personal, contact, and academic details and upload the documents as per the specifications mentioned above. Submit the application form.

  • Print out the completed JMEE application form using your application ID and password. Preserve it for future reference.

  • After submission, the conducting body cannot make any rectifications of the mistakes (if any). In case of incorrect information provided by the candidates, his/ her candidature will be cancelled. To prevent this, such candidates can submit a fresh JMEE application form 2024.

admit_card.html_content:
The authority issued the Assam JMEE 2024 on July 12, 2024. Candidates can download the admit card for Assam JMEE 2024 from July 12 to 21, 2024 on the official website. All candidates needed to carry their JMEE 2024 admit card to the exam centres for verification. Without the JMEE hall ticket 2024, candidates were not allowed to appear for the offline entrance exam. 

How to download the Assam JMEE 2024 Admit Card?

  • Visit the official website and click on the link to the JMEE 2024 admit card.

  • Type in your application number and password/ date of birth.

  • Click on ‘Submit’. Your hall ticket will be displayed on the screen.

  • Download and print out at least 2-3 copies of the same.

Details mentioned on the JMEE 2024 Admit Card

  • Examinee’s name

  • Examinee’s photograph and signature

  • Roll number

  • Date and time of JMEE 2024

  • Name and address of JMEE exam centre 2024

  • Date of Birth

  • Gender

counselling_process.html_content: The exam conducting authority has released the round 1 and 2 Assam JMEE seat allotment on the official website. The last date for Assam JMEE counselling registration and choice filling was August 22, 2024. The authority has released the important dates for JMEE 2024 counselling on the official website jljm.dtecounselling.in. Shortlisted candidates have to report to the Assam Engineering Institute, Chandmari, Guwahati for the JMEE counselling 2024 admission confirmation. Candidates are invited on the basis of their ranks and reservation criteria. It is compulsory for candidates to report at the counselling venue in person, along with the mandatory documents for verification.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
Candidates preparing for the upcoming entrance exam are advised to check the Assam JMEE 2024 exam pattern carefully. The exam pattern of Assam JMEE 2024 gives clear details regarding the type of questions, mode, and medium of exam, time duration, marking scheme, etc. Candidates can check the JMEE exam pattern 2024 below:

JMEE 2024 Exam Pattern

Mode of exam

Offline (OMR sheets will be provided)

Medium of Exam

English

Number of Sections

Four sections:

  • Mathematics

  • Reasoning

  • English

  • Fundamentals of Computing

Duration of Exam

3 hours 

Type of Questions

Multiple choice questions

Number of Questions

Mathematics- 30

Reasoning- 30

English- 20

Fundamentals of Computing- 20

Marking Scheme

+4 for every correct answer

-1 for every incorrect answer

faqs.answer: A candidate who is graduate with Mathematics at 10+2 level or above is eligible to apply for Assam JMEE.

faqs.answer: No, the Assam JMEE entrance was conducted in offline mode.

exam_name: C-CAT - C-DAC's Computerized Common Admission Test
conducting_body: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
CDAC C-CAT 2024: CDAC announced the CDAC C-CAT 2024 result on July 19. Candidates can check the CDAC exam result on the website, cdac.in. Moreover, the authority has commenced the CDAC C-CAT 2024 counselling process. Candidates can complete the CDAC choice filling process from July 19 to 29. The authority conducted the CDAC C-CAT 2024 exam on July 6 & 7. Candidates had to carry the CDAC C-CAT 2024 admit card on the exam day. The authority issued the C-CAT 2024 admit card on July 2. The link to download the admit card for CDAC C-CAT 2024 is updated on the website. CDAC C-CAT 2024 registration for the August 2024 batch concluded on June 26. Candidates can check the schedule of CDAC C-CAT 2024 on the official website.

CDAC C-CAT 2024 results for the August 2024 batch will be declared on July 19. The counselling for CDAC C-CAT 2024 will commence on July 19. The qualifying candidates must select the course and centre from July 19 to 29.

The eligibility criteria for CDAC C-CAT 2024 will differ for various courses such as a postgraduate diploma in mobile computing, a postgraduate diploma in big data analytics, a postgraduate diploma in advanced computing, and a diploma in artificial intelligence. For admission in postgraduate diploma courses, candidates were required to secure at least 50% marks in undergraduate degrees.

The candidates need to know the syllabus of CDAC C-CAT 2024 to improve preparation. Also, to boost preparation candidates must get familiar with the CDAC C-DAC 2024 exam pattern and attempt mock tests.

CDAC C-CAT 2024 Latest News and Updates

  • CDAC counselling process commenced.
  • CDAC C-CAT result announced.
  • CDAC C-CAT exam concluded.
  • CDAC admit card 2024 released.
  • CDAC C-CAT 2024 registration concluded.
  • The schedule of CDAC C-CAT 2024 was released on the official website.
  • CDAC C-CAT 2024 admit card is out on the official website.
  • Centre for Development of Advanced Computing has started the registration process for CDAC C-CAT 2024.
  • The authority has announced the CDAC C-CAT 2024 exam dates in online mode.

About CDAC C-CAT exam

CDAC is a national-level exam conducted by the Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC) to offer candidates admission to the various PG Diploma courses. The authorities conduct the exam twice a year and the duration is 1 hour and 30 minutes. 

CDAC CAT 2024 Courses

COURSE CATEGORY

COURSE NAME

C-CAT PAPER(S)

I

PG Diploma in Geoinformatics (PG-DGi)

Section A

II

PG Diploma in Advanced Computing (PG-DAC)

Section A +

Section B

PG Diploma in IT Infrastructure, Systems & Security (PG-DITISS)

PG Diploma in Internet of Things (PG-DIoT)

PG Diploma in Artificial Intelligence (PG-DAI)

PG Diploma in Mobile Computing (PG-DMC)

PG Diploma in System Software Development (PG-DSSD)

PG Diploma in Advanced Secure Software Development (PG-DASSD)

PG Diploma in HPC System Administration (PG-HPCSA)

III

PG Diploma in Embedded Systems Design (PG-DESD)

Section A +

Section B +

Section C

application_process.html_content:
The authorities concluded the application form of CDAC C-CAT 2024 on June 26, 2024 at the official website. Candidates were advised to check the eligibility criteria first before filling out the application form. Candidates have to visit the online portal and fill in all the important details. They also had to select one of the dates on which they would like to appear for the examination. In the final step, candidates were required to pay the online application fee through a debit or credit card. 

CDAC C-CAT 2024 Exam Fee

Rs. 1350/-

CDAC C-CAT Registration 2024 - Instructions to Follow

  • The candidates must fill in the correct and valid details in the application form to avoid cancellation of the candidature. 
  • Candidates should keep details like application number and password safe for future usage, that is, downloading the admit card and more. 
  • They are also advised to read the eligibility criteria first before filling out the CDAC C-CAT 2024 registration form. 
  • It is important to download the confirmation page and take a printout of it for future usage.

preparation_tips.html_content:
• To score good marks in CDAC C-CAT exam 2024, candidates have to carefully go through the exam syllabus and pattern. With a good knowledge of CDAC C-CAT exam pattern, candidates will be able to know the pattern of the questions asked in the examination. 

  • Candidates are advised to create a CDAC C-CAT preparation plan consisting of important chapters from each subject. 

  • It is further advisable that candidates should analyse their topic-wise strengths and weaknesses and further focus more on their weaker areas. 

  • Candidates should regularly solve the CDAC C-CAT mock test 2024. By solving the CDAC C-CAT previous year papers, candidates will be able to gain the time management required during the examination.

admit_card.html_content:
The exam conducting authority released the CDAC C-CAT admit card 2024 on the official website. To download the admit card of CDAC C-CAT 2024 candidates need to use their application/Form number and password. As the exam authority conducts the exam twice a year, therefore, the admit card is released separately for both sessions. In case of any discrepancy, candidates are advised to contact the exam conducting authority immediately a few days before the exam. Here is a step-by-step guide to download the admit card of CDAC C-CAT 2024: 

How to download CDAC C-CAT 2024 admit card? 

  • Visit the CDAC C-CAT 2024 official website. 

  • Click on the “CDAC C-CAT admit card” direct link. 

  • Enter the application number and password. 

  • The admit card will appear on the screen. 

  • Download it and take a printout for future usage.

counselling_process.html_content:
The CDAC C-CAT counselling 2024 commenced on July 19. The authorities will allocate the seats to the candidates based on their CDAC C-CAT ranks and order of preference submitted during CDAC C-CAT counselling 2024. Candidates can check the CDAC C-CAT counselling date 2024 on the official website.

Those candidates who will get their first preference in the first round itself, will not be allowed to make changes. The seats allocated to the candidates in the second round of counselling are final unless the conducting body conducts another counselling round.

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
The exam pattern of CDAC C-CAT 2024 is available on the official website. The CDAC C-CAT exam pattern 2024 comprises marking scheme, exam duration, number of questions, mode of examination, and more. 

Particulars

Details

Mode of Exam

Online

Medium of Question Paper

English

Duration of Exam (Each section)

1 Hour (each section) 

Number of Questions

50 questions in every section

Types of Questions

MCQs

Total Marks

150 (Per Section)

Marking Scheme

3 Marks for a correct answer. 1 mark will be deducted for a wrong answer

exam_name: WB JECA - West Bengal Joint Examination for Masters in Computer Applications
conducting_body: West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations Board

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
WB JECA 2024: WBJEEB declared the WB JECA 2024 seat allotment result for round 2 on October 1. The WB JECA seat allotment link is updated on the official website, wbjeeb.in. To check the WB JECA seat allotment 2024 result, candidates require their roll number and password. Candidates who are allotted a seat in the WB JECA counselling for round 2 have to report to the allotted institutes by October 4, 2024. The authority announced the WB JECA 2024 seat allotment for round 1 on September 26, 2024. The WB JECA counselling registration and choice-filling concluded on September 24, 2024. Those who have qualified the JECA exam can participate in the counselling process for admission to various participating institutes.
Direct link to check the WB JECA 2024 seat allotment for round 2

The WB JECA 2024 was result on August 9, 2024. The authority has updated the link to check the JECA result 2024 on the official website. Candidates will require their application number and password to check the WB JECA results. Candidates can calculate their expected scores using the WB JECA 2024 answer key. The authority published the final JECA answer key 2024 on August 8, 2024. The answer key comprises the correct answers to the questions asked in the exam. The authority conducted the WB JECA 2024 exam on June 30, 2024.

The authority released the OMR recorded response of WB JECA 2024 on July 19. Candidates can download their recorded responses on the website, wbjeeb.in. Moreover, candidates could challenge the OMR recorded response of JELET by July 21. WB JECA model answer key 2024 was released on July 12. The last date to challenge the WB JECA 2024 answer key was July 14, 2024. 

The authority issued the WB JECA 2024 admit card on June 24. The link to download the admit card of JECA 2024 was updated on the website, wbjeeb.nic.in. The authority concluded the WB JECA 2024 registration on April 30. The registered candidates could correct the details in the WB JECA application form from May 2 to 3. WB JECA 2024 exam will be held on June 30, 2024.

To ace the WB JECA exam, candidates should develop a WB JECA 2024 exam preparation strategy. Candidates are advised to review the WB JECA 2024 syllabus and exam pattern before developing an effective exam strategy. Candidates should practice answering previous year's question papers. Applicants must also prepare for WB JECA 2024 by consulting the best books.

highlights.value: West Bengal Joint Examination for Masters in Computer Applications
West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations Board

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
JECA 2024 eligibility criteria specifies the academic qualifications, domicile, age criterion that are mandatory for candidates to apply for admissions. The detailed eligibility criteria of JECA 2024 is given below.

Candidates must have passed 3-year Bachelor degree programs from UGC recognized University with at least 60% in Honours/Aggregate (45% for SC/ST/OBCA/OBC-B/PwD candidates) along with 60% in Mathematics at the Bachelor’s level together with at least 60% marks in Secondary and Higher Secondary or equivalent examination with at least 60% in Mathematics in both Secondary or equivalent and Higher Secondary or equivalent examinations from recognized Boards.

Candidates, who are due to appear in the 3 year Bachelor degree examination in current year will have to submit their mark sheet or grade card within 3 months from the commencement of the 1st semester classes.

                                                                        OR

UGC and/or AICTE recognized Bachelor’s degree of minimum 3-years duration. Obtained 50% marks (45% marks for SC/ST/OBC-A/OBC-B candidates) at graduation level.

                                                                       OR

Graduate or equivalent degree under (10+2+3) pattern in any discipline of a UGC recognized University/Institute or AICTE recognized B.E./B.Tech/BCA of a University/Institute. Candidate must have Mathematics as one of the subjects at each level of education. Candidates have to secure 60% marks (45% marks for SC/ST/OBCA/OBC-B candidates) at each level education.

                                                                        OR

Candidates must pass 3 year B. Sc. Hons. from UGC recognized university with at least 60% in Honours (55% for SC/ST candidates) in Bachelor level having Mathematics as one of the subject together with at least 60% marks in 10th level and (10+2) level with at least 60% in Mathematics in both 10th and (10+2) level from recognized Board.

application_process.html_content:
The WB JECA 2024 application form correction concluded on the official website. Before completing the application form, candidates should review the WB JECA 2024 eligibility criteria. Candidates must submit the WB JECA application form before the deadline.

Documents required to complete the WB JECA Application Form 2024

  • During the WB JECA 2024 application process, the following documents will be required:

  • A valid mobile phone number and email address are required.

  • Photograph and signature scanned image

  • Academic specifics.

  • Internet Banking or a debit/credit card.

WB JECA 2024 Registration Steps

Step 1: Candidates must first complete the WB JECA 2024 registration process by following the instructions.

  • Visit to the WBJEE registration website.

  • Click on 'JECA 2024 Online Application Form'.

  • Choose 'New Candidate Registration.'

  • Read the instructions and then click 'I agree and Proceed.'

  • For registration, enter your name, parents' names, DOB, mobile number, and email address. All information must be correct and match the information on school admit cards, mark sheets, certificates, photo identity cards, caste/category certificates, and so on.

  • Select a password, as well as a security question and answer.

  • Click the 'Submit' button.

Following successful registration, a WB JECA application number will be generated and communicated to candidates via SMS and email.

Step 2: Filling Out the WB JECA 2024 Application Form- After registering, candidates should login to the candidate portal to complete all of the WB JECA application form details such as personal, academic, and communication information such as domicile, category, PwD status, home district, nationality, religion, and so on. In this step, candidates must also select three preferred WB JECA exam centers.

Step 3: Uploading Documents- Once all of the application details have been entered, candidates must upload scanned images of their photograph and signature in accordance with the specifications provided by the authorities.

Step 4: Fee Payment- After uploading documents, candidates must pay the WB JECA 2024 application fee via net banking/debit/credit card. The WB JECA 2024 application fee is Rs 500 plus bank charges

Step 5: Printing Confirmation Page- After completing the steps, candidates will be directed to the "Downloading Confirmation Page" option. The WB JECA application process will not be completed unless a confirmation page is generated.

admit_card.html_content:
WBJEEB has released the WB JECA admit card 2024 on June 24, 2024. To download the WB JECA admit card 2024, candidates must enter their WB JECA application number and date of birth. Candidates must take precautions to avoid even unintentional mutilation, distortion, or tampering with their admit card. Candidates who do not have such admission cards will be unable to take the exam.

Steps to Download WB JECA 2024 Admit Card

  • Go to wbjeeb.in/jeca.

  • Select the admission card link.

  • Enter your apThe steps below can be used to download the WB JECA 2024 admit card application number and password/birthdate.

  • Select "Login."

  • The WB JECA admit card 2024 will appear on the screen.

  • Print the admit card after downloading it.

counselling_process.html_content:
WBJEEB will announce the WB JECA 2024 seat allotment for round 2 on October 1, 2024.  Candidates can check the WB JECA seat allotment link on the official website, wbjeeb.nic.in. The WB JECA 2024 seat allotment for round 1 was declared on September 26, 2024. The  WB JECA 2024 choice-filling concluded on September 24, 2024. The authority concluded the WB JECA counselling registration on September 24, 2024. Candidates who have been declared qualified in the WB JECA result 2024 are eligible to participate in the counselling process on specified dates set by the board based on their ranks. Eligible candidates must have their documents verified and appear at the designated date and time for the counselling process. No candidate may report on a date other than the one mentioned in the counseling programme. The counseling process is based on rank order and cannot be altered based on individual candidate requests.

Documents required for the verification procedure

  • WB JECA 2024 Counseling Registration Form in Hard Copy

  • Original and self-attested copy of WB JECA rank card

  • Original and self-attested copy of a Class 10 certificate or admission card (or other proof of date of birth).

  • Original and self-attested copy of a Class 10 marksheet

  • Original and self-attested copy of class 12 marksheet

  • Original and self-attested copies of all UG passed course marksheets

  • Original as well as a self-attested copy

  • Certificate for SC/ST/OBC-A/OBC-B/PWD (if applicable) Original as well as a self-attested copy

  • Original as well as a self-attested copy

syllabus.main_exam_title: WB JECA West Bengal Joint Examination for Masters in Computer Applications 2024

units.topics_html:
• Cartesian and polar coordinate
  • Straight line
  • Circle
  • Ellipse
  • Parabola
  • Hyperbola
  • Translation and rotation of axes

• Complex number, De moiver's theorem, solution of linear equations, determinants, matrices, summation of signal series, addition of vectors, scalar and vector products, inequation, sets and elements, universal set, empty set, subsets, Venn diagram
  • Union and intersection of sets, complements, algebra of sets, finite sets, class of sets, partitions, cross product, group, ring and field

• Limit, continuity, and differentiation
  • Maxima and minima
  • Taylor and Maclaruin's series: Definite and indefinite integrals, first and second order differential equation
  • Functions of several variables
  • Partial differentiation

• Permutation, combination
  • Probability
  • Probability distribution
  • Mean
  • Median
  • Mode
  • Standard deviation
  • Correlation coefficient

documents_required.heading: Documents Required at WB JECA 2024 counselling
documents: Two copies of recent passport size colour photograph
Class 10th admit card/ certificate or birth certificate for verification of age
Higher secondary (10+2) level or equivalent certificate
Any other documents as are required for eligibility as per the criteria set by different universities / institutes
SC/ST/OBC-A/OBC-B/PwD certificate issued from competent authority ( where applicable)

faqs.question: What are the WB JECA counselling dates for 2024?
faqs.answer: The WB JECA counselling dates have been announced online. WBJEEB announced the WB JECA seat allotment result for round 1 on September 26, 2024.  The WB JECA counselling registration was held from September 20 to 24. The choice-filling dates were September 23 to 24, 2024. The authority declared the round 2 WB JECA seat allotment on October 1.

faqs.question: What kind of questions are asked in WB JECA?
faqs.answer: Multiple choice questions are asked in WB JECA exam which is conducted offline in pen-paper mode.

faqs.question: Can a Non-Indian apply for admission through WB JECA 2024 ?
faqs.answer: No, only Indian Nationals are eligible to apply and appear for WB JECA 2024.

faqs.question: In what mode are the application forms for WB JECA released?
faqs.answer: The WB JECA 2024 application form has been released online on the official website of WBJEEB.

faqs.question: Why is WB JECA conducted?
faqs.answer: The West Bengal Joint Entrance Exam for Computer Applications (WBJECA) for MCA admissions.

faqs.question: Who conducts WB JECA Exam?
faqs.answer: The West Bengal Joint Entrance Examination Board  conducts the WB JECA.
